name: ralrimdv
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wral(s0, c0, w2)))
-| wi(wa(w0, w1), wral(s0, c0, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wral(s0, c0, w2)))
-| wi(wa(w0, w1), wral(s0, c0, w2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, w1), wral(s0, c0, w2))
-| wi(wa(w0, w1), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w2))
-| diffsw(s0, wa(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wral(s0, c0, w2)))
-| wi(wa(w0, w1), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w2))
-| diffsw(s0, wa(w0, w1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, w1), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wral(s0, c0, w2)))
-| diffsw(s0, wa(w0, w1))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w2)))

body.origin:
|- diffsw(s0, wa(w0, w1))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wral(s0, c0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w2)))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

comment: Inference from Theorem 19.21 of [Margaris] p. 90. (Restricted quantifier version.) (Contributed by NM, 27-May-1998.) Reduce dependencies on axioms. (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 28-Dec-2019.)
